text: XHUCT-FM is a radio station serving Torreón, Coahuila owned by the Universidad Autónoma de Coahuila. It is branded as Radio Universidad and broadcasts on 89.5 FM from its campus. The station came to air on March 7, 2013.UAdeC: "Inicia operaciones estación de radio universitaria de la Unidad Torreón", 7 March 2013 It shares programming with XHUACS-FM 104.1 in Saltillo, which is the other radio station operated by the university. ==References== Category:Radio stations in Coahuila Category:Mass media in Torreón Category:University radio stations in Mexico Category:Radio stations in the Comarca Lagunera
title: XHUCT-FM
